member.name: T:LinqSpecs.Specification`1
member.summary: Base class for query specifications that can be combined using logical AND, OR and NOT operators.

member.name: M:LinqSpecs.Specification`1.ToExpression
member.summary: Returns an expression that defines this query.
member.remarks: Typically calling this method is not needed as the query specification can be converted implicitly to an expression by just assigning it or passing it as such to another method.

member.summary: Returns a string that represents the current specification.
